comparison.description: How the food level should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the food level should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value the food level should be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: Which value the food level should be compared to.

type.description:
[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/food_level)

Checks the entity's food level (chicken legs / hunger meter / whatever you wanna call it). The food level is in the range of 0 to 20.

Type ID: `origins:food_level`

!!! note

    **This entity condition type will only work on players.**
